subject: Basketball
Women and Girls
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Minnesota has struggled since Seimone Augustus tore a ligament in her knee; the Shock’s Taj McWilliams became the 10th W.N.B.A. player to reach 4,000-point mark.
snippet: Minnesota has struggled since Seimone Augustus tore a ligament in her knee; the Shock’s Taj McWilliams became the 10th W.N.B.A. player to reach 4,000-point mark.
